titles.title: Small Business Assistance Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the cost of property which may be expensed by small businesses to $50,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/15/1995--Introduced. Small Business Assistance Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the dollar limitation on the cost of property which may be expensed by businesses as depreciable assets.
